column1: However, the learned counsel for the Petitioner submits that thereafter, the 1st Respondent on
several occasions unconscionably sought to delay these proceedings, variously claiming that;

column2: she  required  a  period  of  two  months  to  file  her  objections  due  to  an  official  trip
she was awaiting certain documents from the 3rd Respondent.
she wished to lodge an appeal in terms of the Right to Information ("RTI") Act on
the 3rd Respondent's response to her RTI request, that the Department of Immigration
and Emigration did not have or maintain a file pertaining to her.
